name: Exploration (itch) (Molten Labs)
description:
Exploration

Exploration is a fun casual game where you have to explore the galaxy of miniature planets.

=> Controls are simple, use your mouse to jump 

=> Try and get the best high-score possible and feel free to share your score with community or me. Let's see what you got.

=> Will soon upload a Windows built if Web built gives problems.

=> That's all, Try it and I hope you like the game.

Updates : 

  1. Added Enemies
  2. Added new Sounds
  3. Improved the Planets Movement
  4. Fixed the motion lag
  5. Added a cool transition on death.

Known Bugs :

  1.  Sound Delay at Start

==> If you guys find any more bugs please inform  me. :D
